attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is our petition to save Ian Macca's job as our youth worker. we need as many signitures as we can in order for the council to offer him a new contract. Tell everybody who knows Ian about the petition so we can get as many votes as we can to save his job!!!

rejection.details: "...petition the Prime Minister to Ian Macca's Barmy Army" does not make sense. This petition system is to request an action from the Prime Minister only, there are other petition systems for general petitions.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
